page.title: 04MEDIA IN CRANHAM
page.content: To find out what types of Media people in Upminster preferred we surveyed families connected with our school. The{DAILY MAIL}was the most popular newspaper receiving 48% followed by the{DAILY EXPRESS}and the{SUN} with 12% each. Most people listen regularly to the radio particularly{CAPITAL}and{ {BBC RADIO 1.} There are 5 local newspapers.The ROMFORD RECORDER is sold in the shops. The YELLOW ADVERTISER,the INDEPENDENT, the OBSERVER,the HAVERING POST are alldelivered weekly free of charge to every home.They report local news and carry local advertising. LBC Radio and Thames TV report London and local news.
